updates.description: Major MLOps Upgrade - Advanced Training, Evaluation & Model Management
features: Parameter-Efficient Fine-Tuning (PEFT/LoRA) - Train lightweight adapter models with 10x fewer parameters
Automated Hyperparameter Tuning - Optuna integration for finding optimal training settings
Model Evaluation Pipeline - Standardized benchmarks for QA, summarization, and classification
Model Registry System - Track versions, metrics, and manage production deployments
Advanced Quantization Support - AWQ and GPTQ for faster inference with minimal accuracy loss
Inference Server Abstraction - Unified interface supporting PyTorch, vLLM, and TensorRT backends
Whisper Speech Recognition - State-of-the-art speech-to-text replacing custom implementation
Separate MLOps Infrastructure - Clean separation of model management from application logic
MLflow Integration Ready - Production-grade model tracking and registry
Improved Training Efficiency - LoRA adapters reduce training time and memory requirements
Better Model Comparison - Automated evaluation and version comparison tools
Enhanced Poseidon - Higher accuracy speech recognition with Whisper integration

updates.description: Thor 1.1 Major Enhancement - Massive improvements to model capabilities, generation quality, and reasoning
features: Multi-step autoregressive text generation - generates longer, more coherent responses (up to 512 tokens)
Advanced decoding strategies - nucleus sampling (top-p), top-k filtering, temperature control
Repetition penalty system - reduces repetitive outputs for better quality
Enhanced prompt engineering - better context understanding and query type detection
Improved model architecture - increased capacity (1280 hidden size, 20 layers, 20 attention heads)
Extended context window - 2048 tokens (doubled from 1024) for longer conversations
Better knowledge integration - knowledge items added directly to generation context
Enhanced reasoning capabilities - multi-step thinking for complex queries
Improved response quality - post-processing for coherence and completeness
Context-aware fallbacks - smarter fallback responses based on query type
Better conversation context - uses up to 8 previous messages (increased from 6)
Think Deeper mode enhancement - generates up to 512 tokens for comprehensive answers

updates.description: Model Improvements & Security Enhancements - Better performance, response quality, and security
features: Response caching system for faster repeated queries (5-minute TTL)
Improved response quality with better error handling and fallbacks
Enhanced input validation and sanitization for security
Rate limiting protection (60 requests per minute per IP)
Security headers (XSS protection, content type options, frame options)
Better error handling and recovery mechanisms
Performance optimizations for faster response times
Improved model fallback system (Thor 1.0 backup when 1.1 fails)

updates.description: Security & Structure Improvements - Enhanced security and code organization
features: Input validation and sanitization to prevent XSS attacks
Rate limiting to prevent abuse (60 requests/minute)
Security headers on all responses (XSS, frame options, content type)
Better error handling with specific error types
Improved code structure and organization
Enhanced logging for security events
